QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_clr_assessment.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_assessment.dev_languages as dev_languages, odf_ca_clr_assessment.security_protocols as security_protocols, odf_ca_clr_assessment.code as code, odf_ca_clr_assessment.report_owner as report_owner, (CASE WHEN (4.0*1)=0 THEN NULL ELSE ((((odf_ca_clr_assessment.architecture*1)+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.dev_languages*1))+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.integration_options*1))+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.security_protocols*1))/(4.0*1) END ) as technology_score, odf_parent_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_parent_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_parent_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_clr_assessment.value_stream_impact as value_stream_impact, odf_ca_clr_assessment.innovation_risk as innovation_risk, odf_ca_clr_assessment.integration_options as integration_options, odf_ca_clr_assessment.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_assessment.architecture as architecture, odf_ca_clr_assessment.mission_critical as mission_critical, odf_ca_clr_assessment.effectiveness as effectiveness, odf_ca_clr_assessment.efficiency as efficiency, odf_ca_clr_assessment.assessment_findings as assessment_findings, odf_ca_clr_assessment.comments as comments, (CASE WHEN (4.0*1)=0 THEN NULL ELSE ((((odf_ca_clr_assessment.vendor_risk*1)+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.regulation*1))+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.internal_support*1))+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.innovation_risk*1))/(4.0*1) END ) as risk_score, odf_ca_clr_assessment.competitive_adv as competitive_adv, odf_ca_clr_assessment.vendor_risk as vendor_risk, odf_ca_clr_assessment.internal_support as internal_support, (select audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_clr_assessment.created_by) as created_by, odf_ca_clr_assessment.regulation as regulation, (select audit_tmplt_updated.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_updated where audit_tmplt_updated.user_id = odf_ca_clr_assessment.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_clr_assessment.name as name, odf_ca_clr_assessment.odf_parent_id as odf_parent_id, odf_ca_clr_assessment.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_clr_assessment.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_clr_assessment.odf_cncrt_parent_id as odf_cncrt_parent_id, odf_ca_clr_assessment.assessment_date as assessment_date, odf_parent_id.entity as odf_entity_code, odf_ca_clr_assessment.status as status, (CASE WHEN (4.0*1)=0 THEN NULL ELSE ((((odf_ca_clr_assessment.competitive_adv*1)+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.value_stream_impact*1))+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.effectiveness*1))+(odf_ca_clr_assessment.efficiency*1))/(4.0*1) END ) as value_score from odf_ca_clr_assessment odf_ca_clr_assessment, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, inv_investments.id odf_pk, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, inv_investments.entity_code as entity, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_end as odf_period_end from inv_investments inv_investments, odf_ca_inv odf_ca_inv, pac_mnt_projects PAC_MNT_PROJECTS, fin_financials fin_financials, odf_object_instance_mapping oim3, odf_ca_financials odf_ca_financials where 1 = 1 and inv_investments.id = odf_ca_inv.id and inv_investments.id = PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.id and inv_investments.id = oim3.primary_object_instance_id and oim3.primary_object_instance_code = 'clr_tech_component' and fin_financials.id = oim3.secondary_object_instance_id and oim3.secondary_object_instance_code = 'financials' and FIN_FINANCIALS.id = odf_ca_financials.id) odf_parent_id where 1 = 1 and odf_ca_clr_assessment.odf_parent_id = odf_parent_id.odf_pk
